feature.label: MDL Lib SDK Feature
feature.description:
This is the MDL Library Eclipse Plugin.
It provides language definitions for the MDL Language and has been developed as part of the DDMoRe project (www.ddmore.eu).
feature.copyright: This software is Copyright (c) 2016 Pfizer Ltd.
feature.license:
